content: Once again our modern technology pulls the wool over the eyes of the technically illiterate. It wasn’t until the 1980’s that we started to develop technologies that where able to begin detecting these measurements. With out all our new technology we wouldn’t know about these changes. We are now observing the arctic using a atomic microscope instead of a wallet magnifier. This all is probably normal. I will bet when they start seeing record lows,(and they will) the global warming fairy tales will spew forth like there is no tomorrow.
